snippet: Tim Kaine, the former Democratic governor of Virginia, has the lead over his Republican challenger, George Allen, in a marquee Senate race that will help determine if Democrats maintain control of the Senate.
abstract: Tim Kaine, the former Democratic governor of Virginia, has the lead over his Republican challenger, George Allen, in a marquee Senate race that will help determine if Democrats maintain control of the Senate.

headline.main: In New Poll, Kaine Ahead in Virginia Senate Race
